name: Diego Leal
bio: Diego Leal is a consulting lead with 10+ years of experience guiding teams through growth, operational change, and data-informed decision making. He partners closely with executives and product leaders to translate goals into clear roadmaps and measurable outcomes.
services: Strategic planning and operating model design
Executive advisory and interim leadership support

projects.title: Minimum Variance Futures Hedge Calculator
projects.description: Advisory-focused Streamlit tool that helps trading and treasury teams size minimum-variance futures hedges using correlation and volatility assumptions. Supports rapid what-if analysis for hedge ratio and contract count decisions.

projects.title: Correlation Sensitivity for Optimal Hedge Ratio
projects.description: Visual analytics app that maps correlation to hedge ratio under fixed spot/futures volatility assumptions. Designed for client workshops to explain hedge effectiveness and assumption sensitivity in plain terms.

projects.title: Portfolio Beta Hedging with Index Futures
projects.description: Decision-support app for equity portfolio managers to calculate minimum-risk index futures hedges and target-beta adjustments. Converts market assumptions into actionable long/short contract recommendations.
